summary: Get Download Link of the Report
description: Retrieves the requested report donwload link

pathParameters.name: file_name
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string representing the report file name

description: Retrieves the requested reports list using the pagination parameters

queryParameters.name: pageNumber
queryParameters.description: This query parameter, a integer representing the requested page number

queryParameters.name: pageSize
queryParameters.description: This query parameter, a integer representing the requested page size

fields.name: from_date
fields.description: Specifies the report requested filter from date

fields.name: to_date
fields.description: Specifies the report requested filter to date

fields.name: time
fields.description: Specifies the report requested filter time

fields.name: skip_zero_balance
fields.description: Specifies the report requested filter (Exclude null and zero asset balances)
